intro: (1/5) Explore estimated water quality conditions across States/Territories/Tribes. Hover over a graphic for an explanation of the results. To learn the available features, click Next. If you would like to begin using the dashboard immediately, click Skip.
(2/5) View all available Indicators by each Condition Class.
(3/5) View each available Indicator by all Condition Classes.
(4/5) Use these controls to change what data are shown.
(5/5) Use these buttons to export an image of the dashboard, download the data, or get help interpretting the dashboard.
